column4: Hi can anyone help me with graphics drivers, I used the restricted drivers and now my dual screen config will not work, and also the log in screen i partly pushed off screen? does anyone know how i can it back to normal but still use ati drivers?
I am using 2.6.27-10 on intrepid. I have a problem in wireless which iwl3945. It all the time get get authenticated and deauthenticated which result in very low throughput any idea
I was using the supported drivers and then I switched to the latest drivers from linux wireless website without use
